title: BitcoinMoses
author: BitcoinMoses
content: Do not get scared. This is an opportunity for new investor to buy and get rich later. Don't ask me, if I am selling my 1.1 million Bitcoin. Just buy some today and you will be surprized later next month. I am just playing a game. A game that will bring more investors in the Bitcoin business place. Beleive it or not the Bitcoin Bull is going to run very soon and it will go to the moon by 25 December when I will bring Bitcoin Jesus back to earth. Do not think Bitcoin value will go to Zero and sell all your Bitcoin. Then the  Bitcoin  Whales will buy your Bitcoin cheaper because you are scared. There after they will become more rich and you will cry loudly saying, ' why didn't I hodl my BTC ? BitcoinMoses  Grand Father of  Bitcoin  Jesus.If you don't beleive in me then go and beleive in Faketoshi. Remember those who say, "we are all Satoshis" are also Faketoshis. Okay ! Dokay ! You are all Satoshis. Only I am myself Bitcoin Moses. PS: The one who control gold makes the rules.

comments.author: Free Market Capitalist
comments.body: I agree with the idea you express that there will be many people who will sell now out of panic when they are doing the opposite of what they should because now is a good time to buy. As Buffett says (although he has no idea about Bitcoin): “Be Fearful When Others Are Greedy and Greedy When Others Are Fearful” What doesn't convince me is your religious view and that something has to happen on December 25.

comments.author: notocactus
comments.body: Quote from: Poker Player on May 12, 2022, 02:21:42 AM“Be Fearful When Others Are Greedy and Greedy When Others Are Fearful”. It is a millionaire advice. The fear and greed index combined with Bitcoin price can be check on LookintoBitcoin.https://www.lookintobitcoin.com/charts/bitcoin-fear-and-greed-index/Crypto market in the past few days are very panic and it is not only because of Bitcoin fall but also because of the drama of Terra and UST. The collapse of Terra ecosystem results in panic in DeFi, stable coins and a whole altcoin ecosystem.The market must be calm down before a recovery. Bitcoin will be fine because history proves it but I am not sure about UST or LUNA.

comments.author: Oluwa-btc
comments.body: People who claim to be Bitcoiner's and still fail to buy the deep in this times might be as a result of the following;Financial drawbacksThey lack self discipline.Not having long Vision.Not being futuristicPatienceAnd tolerance.I think this qualities helps stand out for folks in this times, I actually did buy (dip) for the second time and I'm proud to say!

comments.author: enhu
comments.body: Quote from: tranthidung on May 12, 2022, 02:37:06 AMIt is a millionaire advice. The market must be calm down before a recovery. Bitcoin will be fine because history proves it but I am not sure about UST or LUNA.Its a millionaire's advice that also works for the rich. LUNA is a disaster. Do Kwon's promise to repegged UST is just no guaranteeing to make it to the top again. Very uncertain now, halving is the answer.[/list]

comments.author: DapanasFruit
comments.body: I am sure that right now, there are so many big and small Bitcoin investors who are closely watching when is the possible bottoming out of the current dip. Just because it is true that the dip is the best time to get into Bitcoin does not mean that we should not analyze when is the right time to get in because for all you know after you buy more Bitcoin then the price can go down further. That's why I am really wishing that soon the bottom can already be cler in the Bitcoin market so that there can the the possibility of sudden reversal of fortune for good.

comments.author: Jawhead999
comments.body: First rule, never trust anyone.That's seems to be over confident and yet you're promise to anyone without any guarantee. No one will know how much Bitcoin will worth in the next month and also on December 25, what if it go otherwise?Some people sold their coins in order to buy at the bottom, they aren't really sold their coins and convert it to stable coin/fiat.

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: Quote from: BitcoinMoses on May 11, 2022, 10:17:27 PMDo not get scared. This is an opportunity for new investor to buy and get rich later. Don't ask me, if I am selling my 1.1 million Bitcoin. Just buy some today and you will be surprized later next month. Maybe buying now can be profitable by next month but next month is too short to determine if profit will be made by investing now, but I know next two years will be of good profit making, buying now is not a bad idea at all because bitcoin price will rise.Quote from: BitcoinMoses on May 11, 2022, 10:17:27 PMDo not think Bitcoin value will go to Zero and sell all your Bitcoin. Then the  Bitcoin  Whales will buy your Bitcoin cheaper because you are scared. There after they will become more rich and you will cry loudly saying, ' why didn't I hodl my BTC ? I am not that old to crypto but what I have known is that bitcoin can never even gotten to $10000 not to talk of 0 which is never possible. All what I am seeing right now is that bitcoin will rise and reach six digits by 2025.

comments.author: worle1bm
comments.body: This is always happening whenever we see such crash as people start panicking and weak hands sell off to the strong one at cheap rates which is happening currently.The whales and institutional investors are buying big lots of bitcoin to make profits in the long run while those who have made sell decision will regret.So buy if you can at this time.

comments.author: Argoo
comments.body: The worst forecasts were for the price of bitcoin up to $28,000. But now I see that its price has already dropped below $27,000 and is now becoming $26,955. Drop for the week 31 percent. The same applies to all other cryptocurrencies. Some show weekly drops of 50 percent or more. This is getting interesting. At the same time, we do not see any objective reasons for such a fall in the market, except for its general nature of volatility. And this means that after some time the cryptocurrency will go up again. It is interesting only to what minimum it can fall in the near future. This is a good opportunity to buy potential coins.

comments.author: Rockstarguy
comments.body: Buying bitcoin now is the best thing to do especially for those who want to hodl long-term investment. Predicting that if one should buy and their will be lots of profit, it can be possible or not. It  is very difficult difficult to predict bitcoin profit to take place for a short time, but I believe hodling is the way, patiently waiting until their is an increase. As far as their is a drastic bear in the market, their will also be a time when their will be also bull.

comments.author: pooya87
comments.body: Quote from: BitcoinMoses on May 11, 2022, 10:17:27 PMI am Satoshi NakamotoDon't ask me, if I am selling my 1.1 million Bitcoin.What you are is an identity thief pretending to be who you clearly are not. The second statement alone ensures it since Satoshi Nakamoto does not own 1.1 million bitcoin. The only question I have is why you aren't banned.

comments.author: Jatiluhung
comments.body: that is for sure and everyone will not argue about this even though satoshi i.e. the price of bitcoin goes down because many are selling it. hahaha (joking but true)(now serious) what is happening to bitcoin right now is the phase before it soars higher. like receding sea water before the arrival of a tsunami wave. or like pulling a bow backwards so that it shoots faster.now is not the time to sell but the time to start buying installments.I am confused about people who are afraid to buy when the price drops. and instead they queue to buy when the bitcoin price is above.but of course everyone has their own reasons. like scalpers who of course will cut losses when they lose 10% in contrast to long-term holders who repay when the price drops.

comments.author: P2PECS
comments.body: Quote from: Jatiluhung on May 12, 2022, 08:37:03 AMthat is for sure and everyone will not argue about this even though satoshi i.e. the price of bitcoin goes down because many are selling it. hahaha (joking but true)(now serious) what is happening to bitcoin right now is the phase before it soars higher. like receding sea water before the arrival of a tsunami wave. or like pulling a bow backwards so that it shoots faster.now is not the time to sell but the time to start buying installments.I am confused about people who are afraid to buy when the price drops. and instead they queue to buy when the bitcoin price is above.but of course everyone has their own reasons. like scalpers who of course will cut losses when they lose 10% in contrast to long-term holders who repay when the price drops.I agree with you pal. Now is not a good time to sell, it is a good time to buy. Whenever we talk about BTC and other premium stuff outside of the cryptocurrency market, but I wouldn't buy an altcoin, as most of them are going to eventually disappear and shocks like this are going to help that.

comments.author: Bitstar_coin
comments.body: Quote from: pooya87 on May 12, 2022, 08:02:04 AMQuote from: BitcoinMoses on May 11, 2022, 10:17:27 PMI am Satoshi NakamotoDon't ask me, if I am selling my 1.1 million Bitcoin.What you are is an identity thief pretending to be who you clearly are not. The second statement alone ensures it since Satoshi Nakamoto does not own 1.1 million bitcoin. The only question I have is why you aren't banned.Lol, good question, bitcoinmoses aka faketoshi still enjoys small attention here in the forum when he is clearly trying to steal the identity of one of the greatest mind in history. If he is just working hard to be a forum troll, i say he is doing a poor job, good thing nobody taking this impersonator seriously because we all know Mr Satoshi don't want any publicity, reason why he has remain anonymous.

comments.author: mindrust
comments.body: Buying some is probably a good idea. Don't buy huge chunks though. Nobody can predict the bottom. Maybe it will go much lower, we can't know that. If you slowly DCA your position in and limit the maximum amount you are willing to risk, then you'll only lose that amount if the worst happens and bitcoin goes to zero and it is probably not going to. This is not the first time bitcoin is crashing.

comments.author: BitcoinMoses
comments.body: Quote from: Bitstar_coin on May 12, 2022, 08:48:08 AMQuote from: pooya87 on May 12, 2022, 08:02:04 AMQuote from: BitcoinMoses on May 11, 2022, 10:17:27 PMI am Satoshi NakamotoDon't ask me, if I am selling my 1.1 million Bitcoin.What you are is an identity thief pretending to be who you clearly are not. The second statement alone ensures it since Satoshi Nakamoto does not own 1.1 million bitcoin. The only question I have is why you aren't banned.Lol, good question, bitcoinmoses aka faketoshi still enjoys small attention here in the forum when he is clearly trying to steal the identity of one of the greatest mind in history. If he is just working hard to be a forum troll, i say he is doing a poor job, good thing nobody taking this impersonator seriously because we all know Mr Satoshi don't want any publicity, reason why he has remain anonymous.   You two big head men must understand  two thing, first logic and the second  civil manner. If you think I am impersonator then speak logically, you do not know me as BitcoinMoses neither you know me as satoshi. Nor you know who is satoshi. Therefore, it will be better for you not to accuse me as I am the a thief or impersonator. Any body can claim to be satoshi nakamoto. If you don't believe me now then I win because you don't believe me. If any one do not use their big head to insult me  it remain sceptic with civil manner they are wise people but if someone understand my language and respond to me accordingly then I might invite them to attend a celebration later. You are soliciting to ban me from this forum, well the self appointed moderators or the person  controlling my other account Theymos together have banned many of my accounts. They knows who I am and I know them, I also know who you are and what you are doing in my Forum. I will not get provoked by you. But when the time will come I will ask Angel Gabriel descend from heaven with my Private Keys and I will ask him to sign the message, "I am Satoshi Nakamoto, I am not alone. I have a twin brother his name is SHA 256 and a Grand Father, his name is Nagasaki ........... . Bitcoin Invention, Bitcoin Market place, bitcointalk forum etc all are called Bitcoin Drama. Each person is playing their role in rela life in real time in real world in the Bitcoin Drama stage. If you do not like my thread just simply leave and go and read something else, which is better for you. Bitcoin forum is not for insulting any one. You come here to learn about Bitcoin and get involved and become a faithful Bitcoin adopter and Bitcoin business partner. Who is Satoshi Nakamoto ? And who is Faketoshi or Who is is a troll is not your business. Indeed you yourself is a troll. I will not ask the moderators or staff to removed you or ban you because, you are playing your role for a purpose. One day you will regret and become fully aware that you should have not made this insulting comments. I forgive your sin. But my twin brother won't forgive. BitcoinMoses akaSatoshi Nakamoto

comments.author: BitcoinMoses

One day you will receive a letter from my solicitor regarding this matter.

comments.author: m2017
comments.body: It is difficult to control oneself when the entire crypto market is heading into hell, bringing down prices rapidly. Selling now will only take a loss if BTC was bought at a higher price than it is now. You need to ignore the panic and stick to the plan. When you invested in bitcoin, you had a plan of action, didn't you? Or did you want to sell in a month or two, become a millionaire and rush off to your own island? That doesn't happen. Any investor must go through the ups and downs of the market. The financial well-being of the investor will depend on how he behaves at these moments.I fully agree with OP. Don't be afraid - buy bitcoin!  Discounts will not last forever.

comments.author: BitcoinMoses
comments.created_time: May 12, 2022, 10:10:07 AMLast edit: May 12, 2022, 10:20:32 AM by BitcoinMoses
comments.body: Well, Bitcoin price fluctuation mechanism is designed to behave unpredictively. This is the point where people get an opportunity to make money. Those who buy when the price is high but get scared and sell it when the price dropped down they lose some money but if they hodl Bitcoin and way for the bull to run again faster and reach in high stage then they sell it, they make good profits. You need learn the Bitcoin market and its movement correctly to make profit. Just buy now and make profit latter. This is confirmed and it is proven strategy.
